title: can someone help me  or tell me why that this happened?
body: my friend gift me a soul reaver draven skin before like at 9/13  but now i cant choose it anymore it tell me to buy the skin again.

replies.body: Hey there, it looks like there an issue with the gift that was received.  Reach out to us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) for this so we can offer you more context privately.  See you there!
